title: For Iris - Novel Updates
author: Pirete   피레테
description:
If you don’t expect it, you won’t be disappointed.
If you do nothing, nothing happens.

The 14th library, also called the librarian’s exile.
The only librarian there, Iris, meets a mysterious man one day.

It’s not enough to come here every day.
A good-natured man who overindulges himself for unknown reasons.

“I want you to allow me to come here.”

Werner Gottlief. He made Iris very wary.
One day, he appears for a limited time...
>
